div.pre:
GitHub metrics generator X.Y.Z These generated metrics comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by applicable law.
Last generated: <%= new Date().toGMTString() %>
▇▇▇▇@metrics:~# whoami
▇▇▇▇ registered=▇▇, uid=▇▇, gid=▇▇, followers=▇▇ contributed to ▇▇ repositories ##############
▇▇▇▇@metrics:~# git status
Recent activity<%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> commits <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> pull requests reviewed <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> pull requests opened <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> issues opened <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> issue comments
Tracked activity <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> users followed <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> repositories sponsored <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> repositories starred <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> repositories watched <% if (plugins.lines) { -%>
@@ -▇▇ +▇▇ @@ <% } -%>
▇▇▇▇@metrics:~# ls -lh github/repositories
Total ▇▇ repositories <% if (plugins.traffic) { -%> -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> views <% } -%> -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> stargazers -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> forks -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> watchers dr-x <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> packages dr-x <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> gists <% if (plugins.followup) { -%> dr-x <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> ISSUES -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> ├── open -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> └── closed dr-x <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> PULL_REQUESTS -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> ├── open -r-- <%= `▇▇`.padStart(5) %> └── merged <% } -%> dr-x LICENSE -r-- └── ▇▇▇▇ <% if (plugins.languages) { -%>
▇▇▇▇@metrics:~# locale
<% for (const value of [0.6, 0.2, 0.1, 0.05, 0.05, 0, 0, 0]) { -%> <%= `▇▇▇▇▇▇`.padEnd(12) %> [<%= "#".repeat(Math.ceil(100*value/5)).padEnd(20) %>] ▇% <% } -%><% } -%><% if (plugins.pagespeed) { -%>
▇▇▇▇@metrics:~# curl -I ▇▇▇▇▇▇
User-Agent: Google PageSpeed API Location: ▇▇▇▇▇▇ X-Performance: ▇% X-Accessibility: ▇% X-Best-Practices: ▇% X-SEO: ▇%<% } -%>
Connection reset by 127.0.0.1
